description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to split their body into separate parts and control them independently. The user becomes a 'Splitting Human' who is immune to slashing attacks.

abilities.description: The user can separate their body into individual parts and control them remotely, making them ideal for infiltration and escape.
The user is immune to slashing attacks as their body simply separates where it would be cut.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses: inability to swim and vulnerability to Seastone
Feet cannot be separated from the ground and must remain on the surface

reveals.information: Buggy uses his Bara Bara no Mi powers to escape from his Impel Down cell
